definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: When completed, the new railway will run for250miles.
sentences.chinese: 完工後，新的鐵路線將有250英里長。

sentences.english: He ran up the embankment to the railway.
sentences.chinese: 他跑上路堤向鐵路線奔去。

sentences.english: China is building a high-speed freight rail line all the way to Hamburg Germany.
sentences.chinese: 中國正在建設一條高速貨運鐵路線，直達德國漢堡。

sentences.english: Casablanca was the terminus of a long rickety railway line .
sentences.chinese: 卡莎布蘭卡是一長而軟弱的鐵路線的終點。

sentences.english: The new railway line will run overground.
sentences.chinese: 新鐵路線將鋪在地面上。
建起了中國的第一條跨海鐵路線。

sentences.english: Regularly checked rail lines, but derailments without apparent cause.
sentences.chinese: 定期接受檢查的鐵路線，但是卻無緣無故地脫軌。

sentences.english: The second month will be finance by your downline.
sentences.chinese: 第二個月是財務將由您的沿鐵路線。

sentences.english: The line from Shanghai to Beijing is scheduled to open later this year.
sentences.chinese: 從上海到北京的高速鐵路線計劃是今年年底開通。

sentences.english: There is 5, 000 miles of railway track built on permafrost.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯有5000英里的鐵路線修築在永久凍土層上。

sentences.english: These locomotives ran on Great Western Railway metals until 1940.
sentences.chinese: 在1940年以前一直在大西部鐵路線上運行。

sentences.english: Military forces patrolled train stations and roads to block escape.
sentences.chinese: 而民兵隊伍則監守在公路，鐵路線上，以阻止逃離。

sentences.english: Hadfield steel (13Mn steel) casting frog is an important component part of the railway track.
sentences.chinese: 高錳鋼轍叉是鐵路線路上部結構的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: So far as the railway project is concerned, it is more advantageous to choose Tengchong route than Ruili route.
sentences.chinese: 從鐵路線看，選擇騰衝線比瑞麗線更爲有利。

sentences.english: This means that there still exist a roadbed that can be quickly rebuilt to reopen the line.
sentences.chinese: 這就意味着有一些路基可以快速的重建以前的鐵路線。

sentences.english: There are probably still railway lines in low-resolution areas that I have not been able to find.
sentences.chinese: 可能還有一些低分辨率區域的鐵路線我沒找到。

definition: Hong Kong LRT (Light Rail Transit) (abbr. for 輕便鐵路|轻便铁路)
to load or unload/to transfer/to assemble and disassemble
